commit.message:
emit-rtl.c (const_double_htab_eq): Distinguish integer and fp CONST_DOUBLE; use real_identical.

        * emit-rtl.c (const_double_htab_eq): Distinguish integer and
        fp CONST_DOUBLE; use real_identical.
